NP_functionality.VHDL_PROVIDED: begin out1 <= in2 when(unsigned(in1) /= 0) else in3;

NP_functionality.VHDL_PROVIDED: begin out1 <= not in1(BITSIZE_in1-1) & in1(BITSIZE_in1-2 downto 0);

component_o.description: This component is part of the BAMBU/PANDA IP LIBRARY

NP_functionality.VERILOG_PROVIDED: assign out1 = in1 == in2 || (in1[BITSIZE_in1-2:0] == in2[BITSIZE_in2-2:0] && in1[BITSIZE_in1-2:0] == {BITSIZE_in1-2{1'b0}});
NP_functionality.VHDL_PROVIDED: begin out1 <= (0 => '1', others => '0') when ((in1 = in2) or (in1(BITSIZE_in1-2 downto 0) = in2(BITSIZE_in2-2 downto 0) and unsigned(in1(BITSIZE_in1-2 downto 0)) = 0)) else (others => '0');
